value.name: NYPD: Police Accidentally Killed Unarmed Hispanic Man
value.description: NYPD spokesman Stephen Davis says Rafael Laureano was “inadvertently” struck by a police bullet on Monday in Brooklyn. The assailant, Francisco Carvajal, also died in the shooting. Police say ...

value.name: Police mistakenly shoot man in Brooklyn who was 'trying to protect his girlfriend' from her ex who forced his way into her apartment with a knife
value.description: NYPD spokesman Stephen Davis says Rafael Laureano was 'inadvertently' struck by a police bullet on Monday in Brooklyn. The assailant, Francisco Carvajal, also died in the shooting. Police say ...
